trans-unit.source: A client receiver for multicast traffic from any source, also known as Any Source Multicast (ASM) or Internet Standard Multicast (ISM).
trans-unit.target: 从任意源接收多播流量的客户端接收器，亦称为任意源多播 (ASM) 或 Internet 标准多播 (ISM)。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 此接收器要订阅的多播组地址。

trans-unit.source: The local port for this receiver to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 此接收器要绑定到的本地端口。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from any source.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个可以订阅组地址并从任意源接收数据报的新 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> UDP 客户端。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>构造函数将 UDP 多播套接字的组地址和端口，与相关联，但不会绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。

trans-unit.source: The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.
trans-unit.target: `groupAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。

trans-unit.source: The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.
trans-unit.target: `localPort`参数必须指定一个端口小于 1024。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="groupAddress" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="groupAddress" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: reference
trans-unit.target: 引用

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="localPort" /> is less than 0 -or- <paramref name="localPort" /> is greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localPort" /> 小于 0，或 <paramref name="localPort" /> 大于 65,535。

trans-unit.source: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the <c>callback</c> method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给此操作的 <c>callback</c> 方法的可选状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any group participant.
trans-unit.target: 绑定套接字并开始执行多播组的联接操作，以便允许接收来自任何组参与者的数据报。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用此操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A> method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any multicast group participant.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A>方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到的本地端口和联接多播的组以允许从任何多播的组参与者收到的数据报。

trans-unit.source: The local port and multicast group address are specified in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的本地端口和多播的组地址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`要加入多播的组的操作已完成时调用参数。

trans-unit.source: If required by the runtime, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A> method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 如果所需的运行时，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A>方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端不允许访问，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已经联接多播组，或联接操作正在进行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to store the received data.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储已接收数据的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the <c>buffer</c> where the data should be stored.
trans-unit.target: 应存储数据的 <c>buffer</c> 开始处的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to receive and store in the <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要接收并存储在 <c>buffer</c> 中的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the <c>callback</c> method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给此操作的 <c>callback</c> 方法的可选状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from any sender.
trans-unit.target: 开始执行从已联接的多播组接收数据包的操作，并在来自任何发送方的数据包到达组时调用指定的回调。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用此操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A> method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from any sender.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法开始从来自任何发件人已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。

trans-unit.source: The local port and multicast group address are specified in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的本地端口和多播的组地址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 多播客户端必须具有已完成加入多播组。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: 它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生套接字失败，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus the count is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上此计数大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The buffer that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: 包含要发送的数据的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the <c>buffer</c> to read the data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 要从中读取待发送数据的从 <c>buffer</c> 开始处的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to send from the <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <c>buffer</c> 发送的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The remote endpoint to which the packet is to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 要向其发送数据包的远程终结点。

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the <c>callback</c> method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给此操作的 <c>callback</c> 方法的可选状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of sending a unicast packet to the specified destination.
trans-unit.target: 开始执行向指定目标发送单播数据包的操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用此操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendTo%2A> method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the joined multicast group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendTo%2A>方法开始将 UDP 数据包发送到已联接的多播组的操作。

trans-unit.source: The client must have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。

trans-unit.source: The destination address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter must have already sent a multicast packet to this receiver.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的目标地址`remoteEndPoint`参数必须具有已发送多播的数据包给此接收器。

trans-unit.source: Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages.
trans-unit.target: 某些协议使用此信息来传递流控制，质量的服务统计信息或恢复消息。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。

trans-unit.source: The transmission is only allowed if the address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter has already sent a multicast packet to this receiver.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的地址仅允许传输`remoteEndPoint`参数已具有多路广播的数据包发送到此接收方。

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端不允许访问，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。

trans-unit.source: If the destination port specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter is less than 1,024, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定目标端口`remoteEndPoint`参数为小于 1024，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: 它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生套接字失败，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus the count is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上此计数大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The buffer that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: 包含要发送的数据的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the <c>buffer</c> to read the data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 要从中读取待发送数据的从 <c>buffer</c> 开始处的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to send from the <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <c>buffer</c> 发送的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the <c>callback</c> method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给此操作的 <c>callback</c> 方法的可选状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of sending a packet to a joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has been sent to the group.
trans-unit.target: 开始执行将数据包发送到已联接的多播组的操作，并在已将数据包发送到组时调用指定的回调。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用此操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToGroup%2A> method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the joined multicast group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToGroup%2A>方法开始将 UDP 数据包发送到已联接的多播组的操作。

trans-unit.source: The client must have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: 它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生套接字失败，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than 0
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus the count is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上此计数大于 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The address of the source to block.
trans-unit.target: 要阻止的源地址。

trans-unit.source: Blocks a source so that multicast packets originating from it are no longer received.
trans-unit.target: 阻止源，从而不再接收源自它的多播数据包。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A> method blocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address from being received.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A>方法将一直阻塞源自接收指定的源地址的多路广播的数据包。

trans-unit.source: The client must have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 address, but the `sourceAddress` parameter must match the address family of the multicast group that the client joined.
trans-unit.target: `sourceAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 地址，但`sourceAddress`参数必须与匹配的客户端加入多播组地址族。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the block source operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行块源操作时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> class and the underlying the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 离开多播组并释放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> 类和基础 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>。

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法离开<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>中不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>占用。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> 对象的 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous join operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步联接操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous join group operation to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 完成多播组的异步联接组操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A> method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A>方法完成异步绑定到套接字和联接的多播组的操作。

trans-unit.source: If required by the runtime, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A> method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 如果所需的运行时，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A>方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端不允许访问，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行联接组操作，时套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="result" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="result" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步接收操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: The source endpoint where the packet was received from.
trans-unit.target: 从中接收数据包的源终结点。

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and provides the information received.
trans-unit.target: 完成从已联接的多播组接收数据包的异步操作并提供接收到的信息。

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the message stored in the buffer parameter passed to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 存储在传递给 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的缓冲区参数中的消息长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromGroup%2A> method completes an asynchronous operation to receive a packet from a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法完成一个异步操作以从多播组接收数据包。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行接收操作时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="result" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="result" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous send operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步发送操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the operation of sending a unicast packet to the specified destination.
trans-unit.target: 完成向指定目标发送单播数据包的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndSendTo%2A> method completes an asynchronous operation to send a packet to specified destination address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndSendTo%2A>方法完成一个异步操作以将数据包发送到指定的目标地址。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行接收操作时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="result" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="result" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous send operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步发送操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the operation of sending a packet to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 完成将数据包发送到多播组的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndSendToGroup%2A> method completes an asynchronous operation to send a packet to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndSendToGroup%2A>方法完成一个异步操作以将数据包发送到多播组。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行接收操作时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="result" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="result" /> 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定传出的多路广播数据包是否传递到发送应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates if outgoing packets to a multicast group are delivered to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示向多路广播组发送的传出数据包是否传递到发送应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Multicast traffic is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 多播的流量是在 Internet 上的多对多通信的可扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: A process subscribes to a multicast group address.
trans-unit.target: 进程订阅的多播的组地址。

trans-unit.source: Then, any packets sent by a subscribed process to the multicast group are received by every other process subscribed to the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 然后，任何数据包订阅进程发送到多播组接收订阅的多播地址的每个其他进程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.MulticastLoopback%2A> property controls whether any process on the local computer receives multicast packets sent by this client to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.MulticastLoopback%2A>此客户端发送到多播组的属性控制是否任何处理在本地计算机上接收多播的数据包数。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> used for multicast receive operations on this <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> 实例上的多播接收操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A> property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast receive operations on this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的接收缓冲区的基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用于对此的多播的接收操作<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>实例。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A> property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>属性控制当数据包到达，但尚未调用应用程序时，堆栈所使用的缓冲区的大小<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromGroup%2A> methods, old packets will get dropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果此缓冲区被填满和应用程序调用之前不断涌现数据包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法，旧的数据包将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序永远无法接收旧的数据包，并在它调用时将收到较新的数据包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromGroup%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为 8192 字节。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> used for multicast send operations on this <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> 实例上的多播发送操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A> property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying Socket used for multicast send operations on this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位，用于对此的多播的发送操作的基础套接字的发送缓冲区<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient>实例。

trans-unit.source: calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToGroup%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendTo%2A> methods will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A> property if the send buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToGroup%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BeginSendTo%2A>方法需要较长时间调用根据的值的回调<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>属性，如果发送缓冲区已满。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A> property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>属性仅控制是否用户的缓冲区保持在物理内存中锁定，直到发送完成。

trans-unit.source: The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为 8192 字节。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: The address of the source to unblock.
trans-unit.target: 要取消阻止的源的地址。

trans-unit.source: Unblocks a source that was previously blocked by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource(System.Net.IPAddress)" /> method so that multicast packets originating from it can be received.
trans-unit.target: 取消阻止以前通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource(System.Net.IPAddress)" /> 方法阻止的源，以便可以接收来自该源的多播数据包。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.UnblockSource%2A> method unblocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address so they can be received.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.UnblockSource%2A>方法可取消以便它们都可以接收来自指定的源地址的多路广播的数据包。

trans-unit.source: The specified source address must have previously been blocked by a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定的源地址必须具有已阻止以前通过调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The client must have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.
trans-unit.target: `sourceAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。

trans-unit.source: If the specified source address in the `sourceAddress` parameter was not previously blocked by a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A> method, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AddressNotAvailable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果中指定的源地址`sourceAddress`参数不阻止以前通过调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient.BlockSource%2A>方法，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AddressNotAvailable>。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the unblock source operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果解除阻止源操作，在执行时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未联接多播组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.UdpAnySourceMulticastClient" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 尝试访问套接字时出错。
